patthana21.43:4.1: Narūpiṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.43:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.43:5.1: Narūpiṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.43:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.43:6.1: Naarūpiṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.43:6.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
